message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $90. I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $85. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll still get a fantastic value out of it!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. Would you be willing to go down to $75? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're really close to your bottom line, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $82. I think it's a fair price, and I'm willing to sweeten the deal for you.
